tasks.task: Anyone with dyed hair drinks. Everyone else say a quiet prayer for their roots.
Jeans wearers, drink up for being boring!
Drink if you have any tattoos. If you have more than five, finish your drink.
Glasses wearers, drink. If you can even see the cup that is.
If you've posted a TikTok today, drink.
Drink once for every country you've been to.
Drink once for every bone you've broken. If you've never broken a bone, take a shot. Your lucky streak ends tonight.
If you're the oldest player, drink up granddad.
If you're the youngest player, drink up and put some hair on your chest.
Anyone who claims they aren't drunk must drink.
Drink if you've ever screamed at a horror film.
Drink if Taylor Swift was in your Wrapped.
Ever blacked out from alcohol? Take a shameful drink.
Vapists, drink up.
Anyone that hits their vape this round drinks.
If you're holding a vape right now, drink!
Stoners drink twice.
Drink if you've ever had the shakes.
Drink if you've been high this week.
Drink if you've ever done a line.
If you've ever dated anyone younger than you, drink.
If you've ever dated anyone older than you, drink.
Single people drink twice!
Been cheated on? Everyone else drinks in solidarity.
If you've ever cheated on anyone, take a shot.
Drink if you've ever kissed on the first date.
Ever had a one-night stand? Drink if you have.
Been arrested? If so, drink.
Drink if you've ever shoplifted. Drink again if you got caught.
On the count of three, everyone points at someone else. Drink for every person pointing at you.
Flip a coin. Heads you drink; tails everyone else drinks.
Whoever's turn it just was drinks.
Whoever's turn is next drinks.
Drink if you've had a threesome.
Drink for every sibling you've had.
Drink if you've ever used a sex toy.
Anyone drinking the same thing as you, drinks.
Drink if you've cheated on a test.
Drink if you're not wearing a bra right now. Yes, this includes men.
Have everyone look at you and yawn. First person to yawn back drinks.
Take a sip for every social media you have an account on.
Whoever can name the most Kardashians drinks for flexing that cursed knowledge.
Whoever's cried most recently drink. Sounds like you need it.
Anyone wearing mismatched socks drinks for their questionable fashion choices.
If you have a LinkedIn account, drink for being painfully boring.
If you still owe someone in the room money, drink up and pay them.
Drink if you've ever thrown up somewhere that wasn't a bathroom. You feral beast.
Anyone that’s ever posted an inspirational quote on social media, drink and repent.
Whoever’s the worst drunk texter drinks. Show the evidence if you're brave.
If you've ever ghosted someone, drink in their haunted memory.
Drink if your phone battery is below 20%. Plug it in after this round.
If you've ever accidentally killed a plant you owned, drink for your botanic crimes.
Drink if you have a Pinterest board you’d never share publicly.
Drink if you've ever fallen for a scam email. Nigerian princes thank you.
Drink if you've ever gone back to an ex, drink for being a clown.
Whoever's most likely to fake their own death to avoid responsibilities, drink.
Anyone with a cracked phone screen drinks.
If you've ever spent money on a mobile game, drink.
Anyone that has a crazy 'hear me out' drinks and tells the group.
